API reference∵

The API conforms to the design principles of Representational State Transfer (REST). It supports only the JSON data format.

Using REST∵

Methods to retrieve data from the Balanced API require an HTTP GET request.

Methods that submit data to the Balanced API require an HTTP POST request.

Methods that change data in the Balanced API require an HTTP PUT request.

Methods that destroy data in the Balanced API require an HTTP DELETE request.

Authentication∵

Authenticating to Balanced∵

To authenticate with Balanced, you will need the API key secret provided from the dashboard. You have to use http basic access authentication. Your key has to be set as the username. A password is not required for simplicity.

note

Please keep your private keys secure and do NOT share them with anyone.

For security concerns regarding submitted data, all your requests MUST occur via https.

When asking for help in the IRC channel, NEVER give out your api key's secret.

Errors∵

Standard HTTP status codes are used to communicate the success or failure of a request. A code in the 2xx range indicates success, 4xx indicates an error that resulted from the provided information (e.g. a required parameter was missing, a bank account failed tokenization, etc), 5xx indicates an error with Balanced's servers.

Representation∵

additional
string. Any additional information that may describe how to resolve the issue.
category_code
string. The code of the exception.
category_type
string. The type of the exception. Values: request, banking, or logical
description
string. Description of the exception
extras
key-value. Any extra information associated with this exception.
request_id
string. An ID that can be used to identify and debug the exception.
status
string.
status_code
string. HTTP response code of the exception.

Status Codes∵

HTTP Status Codes

200 ok: resource(s) retrieved successfully.

201 created: resource created.

204 no content: resource deleted.

400 bad request: request is improper and/or malformed.

401 unauthorized: http authentication must be used to access the requested uri.

403 forbidden: not authorized to access the resource at the requested uri.

404 not found: requested uri doesn't exist.

405 method not allowed: http method used is not allowed for the requested uri.

409 conflict: the request was correctly formed but had a logical error.

500, 502, 503, 504 internal server error: something went wrong on Balanced's side.

Bank Accounts∵

You'll eventually want to be able to credit bank accounts without having to ask your users for their information over and over again. To do this, you'll need to create a bank account object.

note
To debit a bank account you must first verify it.

Creating a New Bank Account∵

Creates a new bank account.

name
required string. Name on the bank account.
account_number
required string. Bank account number.
bank_code
required string. Bank account code.
routing_number
required string. Bank account code.
bank_code
required string.
routing_number
required string.
account_type
optional string.
type
optional string.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts

balanced.BankAccount.save()

Balanced::BankAccount.save

\Balanced\BankAccount->save()

BankAccount(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -d "routing_number=121000358" \
     -d "type=checking" \
     -d "name=Johann Bernoulli" \
     -d "account_number=9900000001"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount(
  routing_number='121000358',
  type='checking',
  account_number='9900000001',
  name='Johann Bernoulli'
).save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.new(
  :account_number => '9900000001',
  :name => 'Johann Bernoulli',
  :routing_number => '121000358',
  :type => 'checking'
).save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$bank_account = new \Balanced\BankAccount(array(
    "account_number" => "9900000001",
    "name" => "Johann Bernoulli",
    "routing_number" => "121000358",
    "type" => "checking",
));

$bank_account->save();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("account_number", "9900000001");
payload.put("name", "Johann Bernoulli");
payload.put("routing_number", "121000358");
payload.put("type", "checking");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount(payload);
bankAccount.save();

Response

{
    "_type": "bank_account", 
    "_uris": {
        "credits_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "credits"
        }, 
        "debits_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "debits"
        }, 
        "verifications_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "verifications"
        }
    }, 
    "account_number": "xxxxxx0001", 
    "bank_name": "BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.", 
    "can_debit": false, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:38.068026Z", 
    "credits_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/credits", 
    "customer": null, 
    "debits_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/debits", 
    "fingerprint": "5f0ba9fa3f1122ef13b944a40abfe44e7eba9e16934e64200913cb4c402ace14", 
    "id": "BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y", 
    "meta": {}, 
    "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
    "routing_number": "121000358", 
    "type": "checking", 
    "uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y", 
    "verification_uri": null, 
    "verifications_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/verifications"
}

Retrieve a Bank Account∵

Retrieves the details of a bank account that has previously been created. Supply the uri that was returned from your previous request, and the corresponding bank account information will be returned. The same information is returned when creating the bank account.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

balanced.BankAccount.find

Balanced::BankAccount.find()

Balanced\BankAccount::get

BankAccount(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BAYBae39daGLlFYzJtGPTvw')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5A8YcoSCEPQyCaPCTvmFnW')

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5A8YcoSCEPQyCaPCTvmFnW");

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6wDj2MwJTwkPA4s4rEMq2y");

Response

{
    "_type": "bank_account", 
    "_uris": {
        "credits_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "credits"
        }, 
        "debits_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "debits"
        }, 
        "verifications_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "verifications"
        }
    }, 
    "account_number": "xxxxxx0001", 
    "bank_name": "BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.", 
    "can_debit": false, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:38.068026Z",

    "customer": null, 
    "debits_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/debits", 
    "fingerprint": "5f0ba9fa3f1122ef13b944a40abfe44e7eba9e16934e64200913cb4c402ace14", 
    "id": "BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y", 
    "meta": {}, 
    "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
    "routing_number": "121000358",

    "verifications_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/verifications"
}

List All Bank Accounts∵

Returns a list of bank accounts that you've created but haven't deleted.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts

balanced.BankAccount.query()

Balanced::BankAccount.all

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->bank_accounts

BankAccount.Collection(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_accounts = balanced.BankAccount.query.all()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

Balanced::BankAccount.all

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$bank_accounts = $marketplace->bank_accounts->query()->all();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccount.Collection bankAccounts = new BankAccount.Collection("/v1/bank_accounts");

Response

Delete a Bank Account∵

Permanently delete a bank account. It cannot be undone. All associated credits with a deleted bank account will not be affected.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id

balanced.BankAccount.delete()

Balanced::BankAccount.unstore

Balanced\BankAccount->unstore()

BankAccount.unstore()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA3sIzt37edqCsL8HUemJA8T \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X DELETE

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BARHVIjybOf6v3uQsYOnAYE')
bank_account.delete()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5uvDqG8xk4bGmwX3JTbIee')
bank_account.unstore

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5uvDqG8xk4bGmwX3JTbIee");
$bank_account->unstore();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6nZLdijPKzQ8RhJNnN1OD6");
try {
    bankAccount.unstore();
}
catch (NotCreated e) {
    // the bank account didn't exist in the first place
}

Bank Account Verifications∵

note
If you're sending money to a bank account, known as issuing a credit, you do NOT need to verify the bank account. You'll only need to verify a bank account if you're planning to later debit that account.

Before you can debit a bank account you need to verify that you have access to it. Balanced allows you to do this by creating a Verification for a Bank Account which will result in two random amounts being credited into the bank account. The amounts of these two deposits must be sent back as the amount_1 and amount_2 params when subsequently updating this verification. These deposits will appear on the bank accounts statement as Balanced verification. (see Confirm a Bank Account Verification).

If you fail to verify the bank account you must create a new verification and begin the process again. You can only create one verification at a time and the trial deposits should show in the bank account within 2 business days.

Verifying a Bank Account∵

note
If you're sending money to a bank account, known as issuing a credit, you do NOT need to verify the bank account

Creates a new bank account verification.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/verifications

balanced.Verification().save()

Balanced::Verification.new.save

\Balanced\BankAccountVerification->save()

BankAccount.verify()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66/verifications \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X POST

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BAA31STlZw3eRtjJHyyr0aC')
verification = bank_account.verify()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5gy1b8X8dIGaBWFuoWvkxO')
verification = bank_account.verify

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

// NOTE: Bank account must be associated with a customer before initiating a verification

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5gy1b8X8dIGaBWFuoWvkxO");
$verification = $bank_account->verify();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6czUjW6j4sMputedTuxXE6");
bankAccount.verify();

Response

{
    "_type": "bank_account_authentication", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "attempts": 0, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:42:58.315541Z", 
    "id": "BZ3etuDhvXZ8FSdK6fAJ4s3e", 
    "remaining_attempts": 3, 
    "state": "deposit_succeeded", 
    "updated_at": "2013-11-22T01:42:59.790103Z", 
    "uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66/verifications/BZ3etuDhvXZ8FSdK6fAJ4s3e"
}

Retrieve a Verification for a Bank Account∵

note
If you're sending money to a bank account, known as issuing a credit, you do NOT need to verify the bank account

Gets the verification for a bank account.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/verifications/:verification_id

balanced.Verification.find

Balanced::Verification.find()

Balanced\BankAccountVerification::get

BankAccountVerification(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA3jsRgrp2tubukrt2lqMRNZ/verifications/BZ3nXKyo85wNOKH2VtG6LXqW \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')
verification = balanced.BankAccountVerification.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BAH8CyjUCJzGtnlG7jvGDHy/verifications/BZJPjdW217PPcBBBy1g3RBk')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

verification = Balanced::Verification.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5nW8SMsXjaU3GVWdhR9d60/verifications/BZ5rcuNvebC49kZyTGAaJu2A')

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$verification = Balanced\BankAccountVerification::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5nW8SMsXjaU3GVWdhR9d60/verifications/BZ5rcuNvebC49kZyTGAaJu2A");

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccountVerification verification = new BankAccountVerification("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6jdVg9pWO5ePNdL8ucclXi/verifications/BZ6lvRngcv6BuAu5m5XZAx8A");

Response

{
    "_type": "bank_account_authentication", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "attempts": 0, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:06.742132Z", 
    "id": "BZ3nXKyo85wNOKH2VtG6LXqW", 
    "remaining_attempts": 3, 
    "state": "deposit_succeeded", 
    "updated_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:07.185609Z", 
    "uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3jsRgrp2tubukrt2lqMRNZ/verifications/BZ3nXKyo85wNOKH2VtG6LXqW"
}

Confirm a Bank Account Verification∵

note
If you're sending money to a bank account, known as issuing a credit, you do NOT need to verify the bank account

Confirms the trial deposit amounts. For the test environment the trial deposit amounts are always 1 and 1.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/verifications/:verification_id

balanced.Verification.save

Balanced::Verification.save

Balanced\BankAccountVerification->save()

BankAccountVerification.save()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA3sIzt37edqCsL8HUemJA8T/verifications/BZ3L08fgsw8NURJzM2MKmsey \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "amount_1=1" \
     -d "amount_2=1"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')
verification = balanced.BankAccountVerification.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BARHVIjybOf6v3uQsYOnAYE/verifications/BZTEkn24x0fcao764SiSGTC')
verification.amount_1 = 1
verification.amount_2 = 1
verification.save

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

verification = Balanced::Verification.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5uvDqG8xk4bGmwX3JTbIee/verifications/BZ5wpXXDTZxqLCHiX6V4XXvA')

verification.amount_1 = 1

verification.amount_2 = 1

verification.save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$verification = Balanced\BankAccountVerification::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5uvDqG8xk4bGmwX3JTbIee/verifications/BZ5wpXXDTZxqLCHiX6V4XXvA");
$verification->amount_1 = 1;
$verification->amount_2 = 1;
$verification->save();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccountVerification verification = new BankAccountVerification("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6nZLdijPKzQ8RhJNnN1OD6/verifications/BZ6s3ghAmwY5BhnJIrCKSkUo");
verification.confirm(1, 1);
verification.save();

Response

{
    "_type": "bank_account_authentication", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "attempts": 1, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:27.241941Z", 
    "id": "BZ3L08fgsw8NURJzM2MKmsey", 
    "remaining_attempts": 2, 
    "state": "verified", 
    "updated_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:35.167295Z", 
    "uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA3sIzt37edqCsL8HUemJA8T/verifications/BZ3L08fgsw8NURJzM2MKmsey"
}

Cards∵

You'll eventually want to be able to charge credit/debit cards without having to ask your users for their information over and over again. To do this, you'll need to create a card resource.

To charge a Card, you must create a debit. Before a Card can be debited, it must first be associated with a Customer

Tokenize a Card∵

Creates a new card

card_number
required string. The digits of the credit card number.
expiration_year
required integer. Expiration year.
expiration_month
required integer. Expiration month (e.g. 1 for January).
security_code
optional string. The 3-4 digit security code for the card.
name
optional string.
phone_number
optional string. E.164 formatted phone number.
city
optional string. City. Defaults to null.
region
optional string. Region (e.g. state, province, etc). This field has been deprecated.
state
optional string. US state. This field has been deprecated.
postal_code
required string. Postal code. This is known as a zip code in the USA. requires country_code.
street_address
optional string. Street address. requires postal_code. Defaults to null.
country_code
optional string. Defaults to USA.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.
verify
optional boolean. Flag value, should be true or false. Defaults to null.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/cards

balanced.Card.save()

Balanced::Card.new

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->createCard()

Card(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -d "expiration_month=12" \
     -d "security_code=123" \
     -d "card_number=5105105105105100" \
     -d "expiration_year=2020"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

card = balanced.Card(
  expiration_month='12',
  security_code='123',
  card_number='5105105105105100',
  expiration_year='2020'
).save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

card = Balanced::Card.new(
  :card_number => '5105105105105100',
  :expiration_month => '12',
  :expiration_year => '2020',
  :security_code => '123'
).save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$card = Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->createCard(
    null, null, null, null, null,
    "5105105105105100",
    "123",
    "12",
    "2020"
);

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("card_number", "5105105105105100");
payload.put("expiration_month", 12);
payload.put("expiration_year", 2020);
payload.put("security_code", "123");

Card card = new Card(payload);
card.save();

Response

{
    "_type": "card", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "account": null, 
    "brand": "MasterCard", 
    "card_type": "mastercard", 
    "country_code": null, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:58.990782Z", 
    "customer": null, 
    "expiration_month": 12, 
    "expiration_year": 2020, 
    "hash": "fc4ccd5de54f42a5e75f76fbfde60948440c7a382ee7d21b2bc509ab9cfed788", 
    "id": "CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi", 
    "is_valid": true, 
    "is_verified": true, 
    "last_four": "5100", 
    "meta": {}, 
    "name": null, 
    "postal_code": null, 
    "postal_code_check": "unknown", 
    "security_code_check": "passed", 
    "street_address": null, 
    "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi"
}

Retrieve a Card∵

Retrieves the details of a card that has previously been created. Supply the uri that was returned from your previous request, and the corresponding card information will be returned. The same information is returned when creating the card.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/cards/:card_id

balanced.Card.find

Balanced::Card.find()

Balanced\Card::get

Card(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

card = balanced.Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/cards/CC1i5vMNFo69BmOfBWcx5iZM')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

card = Balanced::Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX')

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX");

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Card card = new Card("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC6NiW8huZV4AxYTDJsjOd7k");

    "customer": null,

    "expiration_year": 2020,

    "id": "CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi", 
    "is_valid": true, 
    "is_verified": true, 
    "last_four": "5100", 
    "meta": {},

    "postal_code": null, 
    "postal_code_check": "unknown", 
    "security_code_check": "passed",

List All Cards∵

Returns a list of cards that you've created.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/cards

balanced.Card.query()

Balanced::Marketplace.cards

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->cards

Card.Collection(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

cards = balanced.Card.query.all();

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

cards = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace.cards

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$cards = $marketplace->cards->query()->all();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Card.Collection cards = new Card.Collection("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards");

Update a Card∵

Update information in a card

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/cards/:card_id

balanced.Card.save()

Balanced::Card.save()

Balanced\Card->save()

Card.save()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "meta[twitter.id]=1234987650" \
     -d "meta[facebook.user_id]=0192837465" \
     -d "meta[my-own-customer-id]=12345"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

card = balanced.Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/cards/CC1i5vMNFo69BmOfBWcx5iZM')
card.meta = {
  'twitter.id': '1234987650',
  'facebook.user_id': '0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id': '12345',
}
card.save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

card = Balanced::Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX')
card.meta = {
  'facebook.user_id' => '0192837465',
  'my-own-customer-id' => '12345',
  'twitter.id' => '1234987650'
}
card.save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX");
$card->meta = array(
    "facebook.user_id" => "0192837465",
    "my-own-customer-id" => "12345",
    "twitter.id" => "1234987650",
);
$card->save();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Card card = new Card("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC6NiW8huZV4AxYTDJsjOd7k");
Map<String, Object> meta = new HashMap<String, Object>();
meta.put("facebook.user_id", "0192837465");
meta.put("my-own-customer-id", "12345");
meta.put("twitter.id", "1234987650");

card.meta = meta;
card.save();

Response

{
    "_type": "card", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "account": null, 
    "brand": "MasterCard", 
    "card_type": "mastercard", 
    "country_code": null, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:43:58.990782Z", 
    "customer": null, 
    "expiration_month": 12, 
    "expiration_year": 2020, 
    "hash": "fc4ccd5de54f42a5e75f76fbfde60948440c7a382ee7d21b2bc509ab9cfed788", 
    "id": "CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi", 
    "is_valid": true, 
    "is_verified": true, 
    "last_four": "5100", 
    "meta": {
        "facebook.user_id": "0192837465", 
        "my-own-customer-id": "12345", 
        "twitter.id": "1234987650"
    }, 
    "name": null, 
    "postal_code": null, 
    "postal_code_check": "unknown", 
    "security_code_check": "passed", 
    "street_address": null, 
    "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi"
}

Invalidating a Card∵

Invalidating a card will mark the card as invalid, so it may not be charged.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/cards/:card_id

balanced.Card.save()

Balanced::Card.invalidate()

Balanced\Card->save()

Card.unstore()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "is_valid=false"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

card = balanced.Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/cards/CC1i5vMNFo69BmOfBWcx5iZM')
card.is_valid = False
card.save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

card = Balanced::Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX')
card.invalidate

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX");
$card->is_valid = false;
$card->save();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Card card = new Card("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC6NiW8huZV4AxYTDJsjOd7k");

try {
    card.unstore();
}
catch (NotCreated e) {
    // card never existed
}

Response

{
    "_type": "card", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "brand": "MasterCard", 
    "card_type": "mastercard", 
    "expiration_month": 12, 
    "expiration_year": 2020, 
    "hash": "fc4ccd5de54f42a5e75f76fbfde60948440c7a382ee7d21b2bc509ab9cfed788", 
    "last_four": "5100", 
    "meta": {
        "facebook.user_id": "0192837465", 
        "my-own-customer-id": "12345", 
        "twitter.id": "1234987650"
    }, 
    "name": null
}

Charging a Card∵

Charging a card requires that you create a new debit

Deleting a Card∵

Permanently delete a card. It cannot be undone. All debits associated with a deleted credit card will not be affected.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/cards/:card_id

balanced.Card.unstore()

Balanced::Card.unstore

Balanced\Card->unstore()

Card.unstore()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC4kIUgvALBKkuRJawgIARXi \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X DELETE

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

card = balanced.Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/cards/CC1i5vMNFo69BmOfBWcx5iZM')
card.unstore()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

card = Balanced::Card.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX')
card.unstore

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$card = Balanced\Card::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC5N3HHUDrAyvhNwQOoUd3UX");
$card->unstore();


?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Card card = new Card("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC6NiW8huZV4AxYTDJsjOd7k");
try {
    card.unstore();
}
catch (NotCreated e) {
    // the card didn't exist in the first place
}

Customers∵

Customers represent businesses or people within your marketplace. You can associate credit cards, debit cards, bank accounts and transactions, i.e. refunds, debits, credits.

Creating a Customer∵

name
optional string or null. Name of the customer or representative of the business.
email
optional string or null. Email address of the customer.
meta
optional key-value or null. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
ssn_last4
optional string or null. Last four digits of the Social Security Number of the customer or representative of the business.
business_name
optional string or null. Full business name if the customer is a business. If there is a business name and EIN present, the customer will be treated as a business instead of a person.
address

optional object.

line1
optional string. Street address of the person or business.
line2
optional string. Second line of the address for the person or business.
city
optional string. City of the person or business.
state
optional string. State of the person or business.
postal_code
optional string. Postal code/zip code of the person or business.
country_code
optional string. Two character country code.
phone
optional string or null. Phone number of the person or business.
dob
optional string or null. Date of birth of the customer or representative of the business. Format is YYYY-MM e.g. "1980-05".
ein
optional string or null. Employee Identification Number of the business if the customer is a business. If there is a business name and EIN present, the customer will be treated as a business instead of a person.
facebook
optional string or null. Facebook ID or username of the customer or representative of the business.
twitter
optional string or null. Twitter ID or username of the customer or representative of the business.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers

balanced.Customer(...).save()

Balanced::Customer.new

Balanced\Customer()

Customer()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X POST

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer().save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

customer = Balanced::Customer.new.save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$customer = new \Balanced\Customer(array(
  "name" => "William Henry Cavendish III",
  "email" => "william@example.com",
));
$customer->save();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("name", "William Henry Cavendish III");
payload.put("email", "william@example.com");

Customer customer = new Customer(payload);
customer.save();

Response

    "credits_uri": "/v1/customers/CU50UEwoz8x4uuJMcY5kDULC/credits",

    "ein": null, 
    "email": null,

        "facebook": "kleinsch", 
        "twitter": "kleinsch"

    "phone": null,

    "twitter": null, 
    "uri": "/v1/customers/CU50UEwoz8x4uuJMcY5kDULC"
}

Adding a Card to a Customer∵

Adding a card to a customer activates the ability to debit an account, more specifically, charging a card.

You can add multiple cards to a customer.

card_number
required string. The digits of the credit card number.
expiration_year
required integer. Expiration year.
expiration_month
required integer. Expiration month (e.g. 1 for January).
security_code
optional string. The 3-4 digit security code for the card.
name
optional string.
phone_number
optional string. E.164 formatted phone number.
city
optional string. City. Defaults to null.
region
optional string. Region (e.g. state, province, etc). This field has been deprecated.
state
optional string. US state. This field has been deprecated.
postal_code
required string. Postal code. This is known as a zip code in the USA. requires country_code.
street_address
optional string. Street address. requires postal_code. Defaults to null.
country_code
optional string. Defaults to USA.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.
verify
optional boolean. Flag value, should be true or false. Defaults to null.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id

balanced.Customer.add_card

Balanced::Customer.add_card

\Balanced\Customer->addCard();

Customer.addCard(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU54t0pwxWKa0m9KfN3Dx79m \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "card_uri=/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC56GyX92EyTfeLzGdNFQBFk"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU3yqhHviPZ4ZbpHMcaa3SKH')
customer.add_card('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/cards/CC3AiMy0KEP1PhwnffMk32RF')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

customer = Balanced::Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU7gMTGKh2yGHYn1lUxH9STS')
response = customer.add_card('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC7iFRCb5AvLuZ9qzIF0VMmA')

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

RESTful\Bootstrap::init();

$customer->addCard("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC72hXVwWbCJsozvJoRELzIc");

customer.addCard("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC15RAm6JJIEIae6bicvlWRw");

Adding a Bank Account to a Customer∵

Adding a bank account to a customer activates the ability to credit a customer, or in this case, initiate a next-day ACH payment.

name
required string. Name on the bank account.
account_number
required string. Bank account number.
bank_code
required string. Bank account code.
routing_number
required string. Bank account code.
bank_code
required string.
routing_number
required string.
account_type
optional string.
type
optional string.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id

balanced.Customer.add_bank_account

Balanced::Customer.add_bank_account

\Balanced\Customer->addBankAccount();

Customer.addBankAccount(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "bank_account_uri=/v1/bank_accounts/BA5e0lSskz5Z8IWROdJHzKQu"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU22xHvLbgGKfzamLW8IZJsr')
customer.add_bank_account('/v1/bank_accounts/BA24Zc2jo1moflunJDxKrCrB')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

customer = Balanced::Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU6n0viWQoT86ttbkCsPgV0Y')
customer.add_bank_account("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6oxYWJXxeM63vMorgtSIhI")

    "facebook": null, 
    "holds_uri": "/v1/customers/CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C/holds", 
    "id": "CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C", 
    "is_identity_verified": false, 
    "meta": {
        "facebook": "kleinsch", 
        "twitter": "kleinsch"
    }, 
    "name": null, 
    "phone": null, 
    "refunds_uri": "/v1/customers/CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C/refunds", 
    "reversals_uri": "/v1/customers/CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C/reversals", 
    "source": null, 
    "ssn_last4": null, 
    "transactions_uri": "/v1/customers/CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C/transactions", 
    "twitter": null, 
    "uri": "/v1/customers/CU5bC3IrV5DOGGd5PXzurT1C"
}

Delete a Customer∵

Permanently delete a customer. It cannot be undone. Only customers without transactions can be deleted.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id

balanced.Customer(...).unstore()

Balanced::Customer.unstore

Balanced\Customer()->unstore()

Customer.unstore()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU5jA2OXwONbHwAeE4huCggw \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X DELETE

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU29FAMV807phGkX4wGIuymW')
customer.unstore()

customer = Balanced::Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU6sqf8CB3M3l6VeSsBqVHhC')
customer.unstore

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$customer = Balanced\Customer::get("/v1/customers/CU6sqf8CB3M3l6VeSsBqVHhC");
$customer->delete();


?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Customer customer = new Customer("/v1/customers/CU7tcMPhFkoiaOjRkmmdBhXO");

try {
    customer.unstore();
}
catch (NotCreated e) {
    // the customer didn't exist in the first place
}

Credits∵

To credit a bank account, you must create a new credit resource.

NOTE If you're sending money to a bank account, known as issuing a credit, you do NOT need to verify the bank account

Credit a New Bank Account∵

To credit a new bank account, you simply pass the amount along with the bank account details. We do not store this bank account when you create a credit this way, so you can safely assume that the information has been deleted.

amount
required integer. USD cents. You must have amount funds transferred to cover the credit.
bank_account

required object.

name
required string. Name on the bank account.
account_number
required string. Bank account number.
bank_code
required string. Bank account code.
routing_number
required string. Bank account code.
type
required string. checking or savings.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.
description
optional string or null. Defaults to null.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~='" ^\`|)

Any other characters will be rejected.

Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/credits

balanced.Credit.save()

Balanced::Credit.save

Balanced\Credit::bankAccount()

BankAccount.credit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/credits \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -d "amount=10000" \
     -d "bank_account[routing_number]=121000358" \
     -d "bank_account[type]=checking" \
     -d "bank_account[name]=Johann Bernoulli" \
     -d "bank_account[account_number]=9900000001"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account_info = {
    "routing_number": "121000358", 
    "type": "checking", 
    "account_number": "9900000001", 
    "name": "Johann Bernoulli"
}

credit = balanced.Credit(
    amount=10000,
    bank_account=bank_account_info
).save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('8c3aeeb80e9e11e38901026ba7f8ec28')

marketplace = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace

bank_account_info = {
  :account_number => '9900000001',
  :name => 'Johann Bernoulli',
  :routing_number => '121000358',
  :type => 'checking'
}
credit = Balanced::Credit.new(
  :amount => 10000,
  :bank_account => bank_account_info
).save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$bank_account_info = array(
    "account_number" => "9900000001",
    "name" => "Johann Bernoulli",
    "routing_number" => "121000358",
    "type" => "checking",
);
$credit = Balanced\Credit::bankAccount(
    10000,
    $bank_account_info
);

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Map<String, Object> bankAccountPayload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
bankAccountPayload.put("name", "Johann Bernoulli");
bankAccountPayload.put("routing_number", "121000358");
bankAccountPayload.put("account_number", "9900000001");
bankAccountPayload.put("type", "checking");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 10000);
payload.put("bank_account", bankAccountPayload);

Credit credit = new Credit(payload);
credit.save();

Response

{
    "_type": "credit", 
    "_uris": {
        "events_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "events"
        }, 
        "reversals_uri": {
            "_type": "page", 
            "key": "reversals"
        }
    }, 
    "account": null, 
    "amount": 10000, 
    "appears_on_statement_as": "example.com", 
    "available_at": null, 
    "bank_account": {
        "_type": "bank_account", 
        "_uris": {}, 
        "account_number": "xxxxxx0001", 
        "bank_name": "BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.", 
        "can_debit": false, 
        "fingerprint": "1eH719hwbYRpEILVKyboPs_pn", 
        "meta": {}, 
        "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
        "routing_number": "121000358", 
        "type": "checking"
    }, 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:44:17.886711Z", 
    "customer": null, 
    "description": null, 
    "destination": {
        "_type": "bank_account", 
        "_uris": {}, 
        "account_number": "xxxxxx0001", 
        "bank_name": "BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.", 
        "can_debit": false, 
        "fingerprint": "1eH719hwbYRpEILVKyboPs_pn", 
        "meta": {}, 
        "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
        "routing_number": "121000358", 
        "type": "checking"
    }, 
    "events_uri": "/v1/credits/CR4FYwQ1iVxndM6C0vvANHYe/events", 
    "fee": null, 
    "id": "CR4FYwQ1iVxndM6C0vvANHYe", 
    "meta": {}, 
    "reversals_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/credits/CR4FYwQ1iVxndM6C0vvANHYe/reversals", 
    "state": "pending", 
    "status": "pending", 
    "transaction_number": "CR044-232-1731", 
    "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/credits/CR4FYwQ1iVxndM6C0vvANHYe"
}

Credit An Existing Bank Account∵

To credit an existing bank account, you simply pass the amount to the nested credit endpoint of a bank account. The credits_uri is a convenient uri provided so that you can simply issue a POST with the amount and a credit shall be created.

amount
required integer. USD cents. You must have amount funds transferred to cover the credit.
description
optional string or null. Defaults to null.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~='" ^\`|)

Any other characters will be rejected.

Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/credits

balanced.BankAccount.credit()

Balanced::BankAccount.credit

Balanced\BankAccount->credit()

BankAccount.credit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/credits?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
      -d amount=10000

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BAYBae39daGLlFYzJtGPTvw')
credit = bank_account.credit(amount=10000)

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

marketplace = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5A8YcoSCEPQyCaPCTvmFnW')
bank_account.credit(:amount => 10000)

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5A8YcoSCEPQyCaPCTvmFnW");
$credit = $bank_account->credit(10000);

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccount ba = new BankAccount("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6wDj2MwJTwkPA4s4rEMq2y");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 1000);

ba.credit(payload);

Retrieve a Credit∵

Retrieves the details of a credit that you've previously created. Use the uri that was previously returned, and the corresponding credit information will be returned.

Definition

GET /v1/credits/:credit_id

balanced.Credit.find()

Balanced::Credit.find

Balanced\Credit::get()

Credit(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/credits/CR4FYwQ1iVxndM6C0vvANHYe \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

credit = balanced.Credit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/credits/CR1xunmvDnFBo3fynM1KnuUm')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

List All Credits∵

Returns a list of credits you've previously created. The credits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent credits appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/credits

balanced.Credit.query

Balanced::Credit.all

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->credits

Marketplace.credits

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/credits \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

credits = balanced.Credit.query.all()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

marketplace = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace

Balanced::Credit.all(:limit => 2)

<?php

RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$credits = $marketplace->credits->query()->all();

?>

Marketplace mp = Marketplace.mine();
Credit.Collection credits = mp.credits;

    "offset": 0,

List All Credits For a Bank Account∵

Returns a list of credits you've previously created to a specific bank account. The credits_uri is a convenient uri provided so that you can simply issue a GET to the credits_uri. The credits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent credits appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

GET https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/:bank_account_id/credits

balanced.BankAccount.credits

Balanced::BankAccount.credits

Balanced\BankAccount->credits()

BankAccount.credits

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/bank_accounts/BA3XbVk9pHbz7wbI1KaNcd8Y/credits?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

bank_account = balanced.BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BAYBae39daGLlFYzJtGPTvw')
credits = bank_account.credits.all()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

marketplace = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace

bank_account = Balanced::BankAccount.find('/v1/bank_accounts/BA5A8YcoSCEPQyCaPCTvmFnW')
credits = bank_account.credits

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$bank_account = Balanced\BankAccount::get("/v1/bank_accounts/BA5A8YcoSCEPQyCaPCTvmFnW");
$credits = $bank_account->credits->query()->all();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

BankAccount bankAccount = new BankAccount("/v1/bank_accounts/BA6wDj2MwJTwkPA4s4rEMq2y");
Credit.Collection credits = bankAccount.credits;

Create a New Credit For a Customer∵

amount
required integer. USD cents. You must have amount funds transferred to cover the credit.
bank_account

required object.

name
required string. Name on the bank account.
account_number
required string. Bank account number.
bank_code
required string. Bank account code.
routing_number
required string. Bank account code.
type
required string. checking or savings.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.
description
optional string or null. Defaults to null.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~='" ^\`|)

Any other characters will be rejected.

Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id/credits

balanced.Customer.credit()

Balanced::Customer.credit

Balanced\Customer::credit()

Customer.credit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M/credits \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -d "amount=100"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CUyABeNYx8vHAaP4KRsd1j4/credits')
customer.credit(amount=100)

customer = Balanced::Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU5f64LhFMO8cf7N1sQSRVOo')
customer.credit(:amount => 100)

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$customer = Balanced\Customer::get("/v1/customers/CU5f64LhFMO8cf7N1sQSRVOo");
$customer->credit(100);

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Customer customer = new Customer("/v1/customers/CU6bg92aGrSXuWUF6usdhBbw");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 100);

customer.credit(payload);

Listing All Credits For a Customer∵

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id/credits

balanced.Customer.credits

Balanced::Customer.credits

Balanced\Customer->credits()

Customer.credits

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M/credits?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CUyABeNYx8vHAaP4KRsd1j4')

// this scenario is not present in scenarios.cache
// so the customer_uri will be rendered as an empty string
Customer customer = new Customer("/v1/customers/CU6bg92aGrSXuWUF6usdhBbw");
Credit.Collection credits = customer.credits;

                "customer_uri": "/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M", 
                "debits_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66/debits", 
                "fingerprint": "5f0ba9fa3f1122ef13b944a40abfe44e7eba9e16934e64200913cb4c402ace14", 
                "id": "BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66", 
                "is_valid": true, 
                "last_four": "0001", 
                "meta": {}, 
                "name": "Johann Bernoulli", 
                "routing_number": "121000358", 
                "type": "checking", 
                "uri": "/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M/bank_accounts/BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66", 
                "verification_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66/verifications/BZ3etuDhvXZ8FSdK6fAJ4s3e", 
                "verifications_uri": "/v1/bank_accounts/BA36ZrFkTzIrwl3ZIzmNeM66/verifications"
            }, 
            "events_uri": "/v1/credits/CR4UnNDEf4gfbVYlcYeXpXnQ/events", 
            "fee": null, 
            "id": "CR4UnNDEf4gfbVYlcYeXpXnQ", 
            "meta": {}, 
            "reversals_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/credits/CR4UnNDEf4gfbVYlcYeXpXnQ/reversals", 
            "state": "cleared", 
            "status": "paid", 
            "transaction_number": "CR797-716-1899", 
            "uri": "/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M/credits/CR4UnNDEf4gfbVYlcYeXpXnQ"
        }
    ], 
    "last_uri": "/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M/credits?limit=2&offset=0", 
    "limit": 2, 
    "next_uri": null, 
    "offset": 0, 
    "previous_uri": null, 
    "total": 1, 
    "uri": "/v1/customers/CU34nUOWZPonYNaQZFpN2E5M/credits?limit=2&offset=0"
}

Debits∵

To debit an account, i.e. charge a card or bank account, you must create a new debit resource.

Create a New Debit∵

Debits an account. Returns a uri that can later be used to reference this debit.

Successful creation of a debit using a card will return an associated hold mapping as part of the response. This hold was created and captured behind the scenes automatically. For ACH debits there is no corresponding hold.

on_behalf_of_uri
optional string. A customer or the account of a merchant, usually a seller or service provider, that is associated with this card charge or bank account debit.
merchant_uri
optional string. Deprecated The account of a merchant, usually a seller or service provider, that is associated with this card charge or bank account debit. Deprecated in favour of on_behalf_of_uri.
amount
optional integer. USD cents. If the resolving URI references a hold then this is hold amount. You can always capture less than the hold amount (e.g. a partial capture). Otherwise its the maximum per debit amount for your marketplace. If the resolving URI references a hold then the default amount is the amount associated with that hold. Otherwise no default is provided and this field is required.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~='" ^\`|)

Any other characters will be rejected.

Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.
description
optional string. Defaults to null.
account_uri
optional string.
customer_uri
optional string.
hold_uri
optional string. If no hold is provided one my be generated and captured if the funding source is a card. If the resolved URI references a hold it will be used. Otherwise defaults to null.
source_uri
optional string. URI of a specific bank account or card to be debited.
bank_account_uri
optional string. Deprecated This field is deprecated in favor of source_uri.
card_uri
optional string. Deprecated This field is deprecated in favor of source_uri.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id/debits

balanced.Customer.debit()

Balanced::Customer.debit

\Balanced\Customer->debit();

Customer.debit(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/debits \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -d "appears_on_statement_as=Statement text" \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU2dUh4jpUihIQsHFbTwuDAc')
customer.debit(amount=5000)

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

customer = Balanced::Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU6vs1tjxBtifgTuzKjCGtVS')
customer.debit(:amount => 5000)

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$customer = \Balanced\Customer::get("/v1/customers/CU6vs1tjxBtifgTuzKjCGtVS");
$customer->debit('5000');

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Customer customer = new Customer("/v1/customers/CU7wGDVh8FjYMPfkPl9SzWAu");
customer.save();

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);

customer.debit(payload);

Retrieve a Debit∵

Retrieves the details of a created debit.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/debits/:debit_id

balanced.Debit.find

Balanced::Debit.find()

Balanced\Debit::get

Debit(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits/WD5xKk0lgsowPG2DvwMHcNxk \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

debit = balanced.Debit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/debits/WD2lQO6cFyxyTWj6mLQ6zFDO')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

debit = Balanced::Debit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/debits/WD6Ca1z3nrRRCdiYT1evN19S')

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$debit = Balanced\Debit::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/debits/WD6Ca1z3nrRRCdiYT1evN19S");

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Debit debit = new Debit("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/debits/WD7FdeaD0Zh9x6hZMpd5fstW");

    "status": "succeeded", 
    "transaction_number": "W533-887-9688", 
    "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits/WD5xKk0lgsowPG2DvwMHcNxk"
}

List All Debits∵

Returns a list of debits you've previously created. The debits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent debits appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/debits

balanced.Debit.query()

Balanced::Debit.all

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->debits

Debit.Collection(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

debits = balanced.Debit.query.all();

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

marketplace = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace

debits = Balanced::Debit.all(:limit => 2)

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$debits = $marketplace->debits->query()->all();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Debit.Collection debits = new Debit.Collection("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/debits");

            "transaction_number": "W451-338-6879", 
            "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits/WD5shsZwfxKH5nb79LWwSjSG"
        }
    ], 
    "last_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits?limit=2&offset=2", 
    "limit": 2, 
    "next_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits?limit=2&offset=2", 
    "offset": 0, 
    "previous_uri": null, 
    "total": 3, 
    "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits?limit=2&offset=0"
}

List All Debits For a Customer∵

Returns a list of debits you've previously created against a specific account. The debits_uri is a convenient uri provided so that you can simply issue a GET to the debits_uri. The debits are returned in sorted order, with the most recent debits appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/:customer_id/debits

balanced.Customer.debits

Balanced::Customer.debits

Balanced\Customer->debits()

Customer.debits

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/customers/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

customer = balanced.Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU2dUh4jpUihIQsHFbTwuDAc')
debits = customer.debits.all()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')


customer = Balanced::Customer.find('/v1/customers/CU6vs1tjxBtifgTuzKjCGtVS')
debits = customer.debits

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$customer = Balanced\Customer::get("/v1/customers/CU6vs1tjxBtifgTuzKjCGtVS");
$debits = $customer->debits->query()->all();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Customer customer = new Customer("/v1/customers/CU7wGDVh8FjYMPfkPl9SzWAu");
Debit.Collection debits = customer.debits;

Update a Debit∵

Updates information about a debit

meta
optional object. Single level mapping from string keys to string values.
description
optional string. Sequence of characters.

Definition

PUT https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/debits/:debit_id

balanced.Debit.save()

Balanced::Debit.save()

Balanced\Debit->save()

Debit.save()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits/WD5xKk0lgsowPG2DvwMHcNxk \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X PUT \
     -d "description=New description for debit" \
     -d "meta[facebook.id]=1234567890" \
     -d "meta[anykey]=valuegoeshere"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

debit = balanced.Debit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/debits/WD2lQO6cFyxyTWj6mLQ6zFDO')
debit.description = 'New description for debit'
debit.meta = {
  'facebook.id': '1234567890',
  'anykey': 'valuegoeshere',
}
debit.save()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

debit = Balanced::Debit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/debits/WD6Ca1z3nrRRCdiYT1evN19S')
debit.description = 'New description for debit'
debit.meta = {
    'anykey' => 'valuegoeshere',
    'facebook.id' => '1234567890'
}
debit.save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$debit = Balanced\Debit::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/debits/WD6Ca1z3nrRRCdiYT1evN19S");
$debit->description = "New description for debit";
$debit->meta = array(
    "anykey" => "valuegoeshere",
    "facebook.id" => "1234567890",
);
$debit->save();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Debit debit = new Debit("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/debits/WD7FdeaD0Zh9x6hZMpd5fstW");
debit.description = "New description for debit";

Map<String, String> meta = new HashMap<String, String>();
meta.put("anykey", "valuegoeshere");
meta.put("facebook.id", "1234567890");

debit.meta = meta;
debit.save();

Refund a Debit∵

Issues a refund for a particular debit. This creates a refund.

Use the refund_uri on a debit object.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/debits/:debit_id/refunds

balanced.Debit.refund()

Balanced::Debit.refund()

Balanced\Debit->refund()

Debit.refund()

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/debits/WD5SyBaY4zNlIAPRJbfAH7VZ/refunds \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -X POST

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

debit = balanced.Debit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/debits/WD2za3rLGBUpINViqUGbY5XW')
debit.refund()

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

debit = Balanced::Debit.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/debits/WD6MTAHor9FhO4G2nvZwaXvi')
debit.refund

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$debit = Balanced\Debit::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/debits/WD6MTAHor9FhO4G2nvZwaXvi");
$debit->refund();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Debit debit = new Debit("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/debits/WD2jklEbzgwLjRiEPpIbWOs");
debit.refund();

    "_type": "refund", 
    "_uris": {}, 
    "account": {
        "_type": "account", 
        "_uris": {

        "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:44:56.558633Z", 
        "credits_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/credits", 
        "customer_uri": "/v1/customers/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM", 
        "debits_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/debits", 
        "email_address": null, 
        "holds_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/holds", 
        "id": "CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM", 
        "meta": {
            "facebook": "kleinsch", 
            "twitter": "kleinsch"
        }, 
        "name": null, 
        "refunds_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/refunds", 
        "reversals_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/reversals", 
        "roles": [
            "buyer"
        ], 
        "transactions_uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/transactions", 
        "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/accounts/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM"
    }, 
    "amount": 5000, 
    "appears_on_statement_as": "Statement text", 
    "created_at": "2013-11-22T01:45:26.913102Z",

        "destination": null, 
        "dob": null, 
        "ein": null, 
        "email": null, 
        "facebook": null, 
        "holds_uri": "/v1/customers/CU5ntwSmUauw7xww7A2AyMzM/holds",

        "transaction_number": "W529-278-4966",

    },

    "events_uri": "/v1/refunds/RF5VAXM5EiTUdpZygR6pX1gc/events", 
    "fee": null, 
    "id": "RF5VAXM5EiTUdpZygR6pX1gc", 
    "meta": {}, 
    "status": "succeeded", 
    "transaction_number": "RF881-401-2274", 
    "uri": "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/refunds/RF5VAXM5EiTUdpZygR6pX1gc"
}

Holds∵

Holds are a type of authorization that reserves (i.e. holds) a dollar amount on the customer's credit card, usually within 7 days.

A successful hold can be captured, and as a result, creates a debit.

Create a New Hold∵

Creates a hold against a card. Returns a uri that can later be used to create a debit, up to the full amount of the hold.

amount
required integer. USD cents.
account_uri
optional string. If the resolving URI references an account then that is used as the default. Otherwise no default is provided and this field is required.
appears_on_statement_as

optional string. Text that will appear on the buyer's statement. Characters that can be used are limited to:

  • ASCII letters (a-z and A-Z)
  • Digits (0-9)
  • Special characters (.<>(){}[]+&!$;-%_?:#@~='" ^\`|)

Any other characters will be rejected.

Debits - Truncated to 18 characters. Credits - Truncated to 14 characters.

All Visa, Master Card, Discover, American Express debits will have a prefix of "BAL*" e.g. "BAL*marketplace.com".

ACH debits and credits do not have a prefix.

American Express pending transactions will be shown as "BALANCED INC". AMEX pending transactions are hidden by default in the American Express web portal. Once the debit is settled it will convert to "BAL*<appears_on_statement_as>".

description
optional string.
meta
optional key-value. Single level mapping from string keys to string values. Defaults to {}.
source_uri
optional string.
card_uri
optional string.

Definition

POST https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/holds

balanced.Hold(...)

Balanced::Customer.hold(...)

\Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->holds->create()

Hold(Map<String, Object> payload)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/holds \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR: \
     -d "source_uri=/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/cards/CC6b0UgJ2q3yDhf6XOtmHvzh" \
     -d "amount=5000" \
     -d "description=Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard"

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

hold = balanced.Hold(
  source_uri='/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/cards/CC3AiMy0KEP1PhwnffMk32RF',
  amount=5000,
  description='Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard'
)

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

hold = Balanced::Hold.new(
  :amount => 5000,
  :description => 'Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard',
  :source_uri => '/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC7iFRCb5AvLuZ9qzIF0VMmA'
)
hold.save

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$marketplace = \Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$hold = $marketplace->holds->create(array(
  "amount" => 5000,
  "description" => "Some descriptive text for the debit in the dashboard",
  "source_uri" => "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/cards/CC72hXVwWbCJsozvJoRELzIc"
));

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Customer customer = new Customer("/v1/customers/CU12eUdTk8OgEj7VbJVFeP0q");
customer.addCard("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC15RAm6JJIEIae6bicvlWRw");

Map<String, Object> payload = new HashMap<String, Object>();
payload.put("amount", 5000);
payload.put("source_uri", "/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/cards/CC15RAm6JJIEIae6bicvlWRw");

Hold hold = new Hold(payload);
hold.save();

Retrieve a Hold∵

Retrieves the details of a hold that you've previously created. Use the uri that was previously returned, and the corresponding hold information will be returned.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/holds/:hold_id

balanced.Hold.find

Balanced::Hold.find()

Balanced\Hold::get

Hold(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/holds/HL6e96zYy0ZUW3qypkML1qIK \
     -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

hold = balanced.Hold.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP52IlCmywk6hGbgS75QSlN/holds/HL2PtUrw5zStavbcn933ZsmW')

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

hold = Balanced::Hold.find('/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/holds/HL74dRg2HWc5vQwX0kQ9XQfM')

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$hold = Balanced\Hold::get("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP4K6K0PWGyPtXL4LZ42sQSb/holds/HL74dRg2HWc5vQwX0kQ9XQfM");

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Hold hold = new Hold("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/holds/HLgZ3lv8DVAtfnxDJmieJ5S");

List all Holds∵

Returns a list of holds you've previously created. The holds are returned in sorted order, with the most recent holds appearing first.

limit
optional integer. Defaults to 10.
offset
optional integer. Defaults to 0.

Definition

OPTIONS https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/:marketplace_id/holds

balanced.Hold.query()

Balanced::Hold.all

Balanced\Marketplace::mine()->holds

Hold.Collection(String uri)

Request

curl https://api.balancedpayments.com/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP2oRTf6eEiGrBkS3ahqYdHN/holds?limit=2 \
      -u ak-test-2J6ztzBYQlzwPu8Ofqa5kfJXoXyE8JiCR:

import balanced

balanced.configure('ak-test-14W5azoiV99O1XiPwZ3faH10MaUdZ1kCA')

holds = balanced.Hold.query.all();

require 'balanced'
Balanced.configure('ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD')

marketplace = Balanced::Marketplace.my_marketplace

holds = Balanced::Hold.all(:limit => 2)

<?php

require(__DIR__ . '/vendor/autoload.php');

Httpful\Bootstrap::init();
RESTful\Bootstrap::init();
Balanced\Bootstrap::init();

Balanced\Settings::$api_key = "ak-test-2KZfoLyijij3Y6OyhDAvFRF9tXzelBLpD";

$marketplace = Balanced\Marketplace::mine();
$holds = $marketplace->holds->query()->all();

?>

Balanced.configure("ak-test-1p1Tsac7gHeMQowL2seB7ieliuAJAufyq");

Hold.Collection holds = new Hold.Collection("/v1/marketplaces/TEST-MP5FKPQwyjvVgTDt7EiRw3Kq/holds");
